languages.text:
"Встали вдвоем на простертым телом они,
Телом не зверя, но павшего смелого брата.
Клятву отмщения грозный Ульфар произнес
И устремились в Кьялхаллу могучие Волки!
Знали они, что отныне с предателей их
Трижды кровавая плата взыскана будет.

"The pair stood together
over the prostrate body,
The body not of a beast,
but of a brave fallen brother.
The fearsome Ulfar declared
an oath of vengeance,
and the mighty Wolves
to Kjalhalla went charging!
They went knowing
that from their betrayers
three times the blood price
would be exacted.
languages.original_text:

languages.text:
「ふたりは倒れた死体の上に
共に立ち尽くした
獣の死体ではなく
勇敢に倒れた兄弟の遺体だった。
凄惨なウルファーは
復讐の誓いを立て
力強き狼たちは
ヴァルハラへ向かった！
彼らは誓った
裏切り者から
3倍の血の代償を
払ってもらわなければならないと」
languages.original_text:
"The pair stood together
over the prostrate body,
The body not of a beast,
but of a brave fallen brother.
The fearsome Ulfar declared
an oath of vengeance,
and the mighty Wolves
to Kjalhalla went charging!
They went knowing
that from their betrayers
three times the blood price
would be exacted.

復讐の誓いを立て
力強き狼たちは
ヴァルハラへ向かった！
彼らは誓った
裏切り者から
3倍の血の代償を
払ってもらわなければならないと」

languages.text:
“两人站在倒地的尸体旁，
这不是野兽的尸体，
而是一名英勇的兄弟。
怒发冲冠的乌尔法，
发下复仇的誓言。
凶猛的奔狼立刻，
向卡尔哈拉袭去！
他们知道，
他们要从背叛者的身上，
索取三倍的，
血的代价。
languages.original_text:
"The pair stood together
over the prostrate body,
The body not of a beast,
but of a brave fallen brother.
The fearsome Ulfar declared
an oath of vengeance,
and the mighty Wolves
to Kjalhalla went charging!
They went knowing
that from their betrayers
three times the blood price
would be exacted.

索取三倍的，
血的代价。

languages.text:
« Les deux se tenaient ensemble
devant le corps prostré,
non pas d'une bête sauvage,
mais d'un courageux frère vaincu.
Le redoutable Ulfar
fit serment de le venger
et les puissants loups
partirent à l'assaut de Kjalhalla !
Des traîtres, ils escomptaient
exiger le prix du sang
au triple des pertes
qu'ils avaient dû subir. »
languages.original_text:
"The pair stood together
over the prostrate body,
The body not of a beast,
but of a brave fallen brother.
The fearsome Ulfar declared
an oath of vengeance,
and the mighty Wolves
to Kjalhalla went charging!
They went knowing
that from their betrayers
three times the blood price
would be exacted.

languages.text:
«Ambos se alzaron juntos
sobre el cadáver derribado,
no de una bestia,
sino de un valiente hermano.
El temible Ulfar proclamó
un juramento de venganza,
¡y los imparables Lobos
hacia Kjalhalla partieron a la carga!
Avanzaron con la certeza
de que de sus traidores
tres veces más sangre
sin duda se cobrarían».
languages.original_text:
"The pair stood together
over the prostrate body,
The body not of a beast,
but of a brave fallen brother.
The fearsome Ulfar declared
an oath of vengeance,
and the mighty Wolves
to Kjalhalla went charging!
They went knowing
that from their betrayers
three times the blood price
would be exacted.

languages.text:
"Das Paar stand gemeinsam
über dem liegenden Körper,
dem Körper nicht eines Untiers,
sondern eines mutigen gefallenen Bruders.
Der furchterregende Ulfar schwor
einen Eid der Rache,
und die mächtigen Wölfe
rannten nach Kjalhalla!
Sie gingen in dem Wissen,
dass von ihren Verrätern
sie dreifach den Blutpreis
fordern würden.
languages.original_text:
"The pair stood together
over the prostrate body,
The body not of a beast,
but of a brave fallen brother.
The fearsome Ulfar declared
an oath of vengeance,
and the mighty Wolves
to Kjalhalla went charging!
They went knowing
that from their betrayers
three times the blood price
would be exacted.

languages.text:
"İkili dikildi başında
Perişan cesedin.
Beden bir canavarın değil,
Yitmiş, cesur bir kardeşindi.
Korkunç Ulfar oracıkta
Etti dönülmez bir intikam yemini.
Sonra kudretli Kurtlar,
Kjalhalla'ya hücum etti!
Giderken biliyorlardı
Kendilerine ihanet edenlerden
Üç katı kan borcu
Alınacağını.
languages.original_text:
"The pair stood together
over the prostrate body,
The body not of a beast,
but of a brave fallen brother.
The fearsome Ulfar declared
an oath of vengeance,
and the mighty Wolves
to Kjalhalla went charging!
They went knowing
that from their betrayers
three times the blood price
would be exacted.

traits.locale_text:
"İkili dikildi başında
perişan bedenin.
Beden bir canavarın değildi,
cesur bir düşmüş kardeşindi.
Korkunç Ulfar etti
dönülmez bir intikam yemini.
Kudretli Kurtlar,
Kjalhalla'ya hücum etti!
Giderken biliyorlardı
kendilerine ihanet edenlerden
üç katı kan borcu
alınacağını.
